channel.title: ERC on Dr Franziskus Kiefer
channel.description: Recent content in ERC on Dr Franziskus Kiefer

item.title: Cryspen ERC PoC Grant
item.description: My co-founder Karthik got awarded an ERC Proof of Concept grant for commercialising the know-how and landmark research results from his Inria research group PROSECCO through Cryspen. Announcement Cryptographic mechanisms are crucial to the security of our digital lives but their design and implementation remains notoriously difficult and error-prone. With the help of two ERC Grants, Karthikeyan Bhargavan and the Prosecco team at Inria have developed state-of-the-art formal verification techniques that can be applied to real-world cryptographic software.
